document_data.name: Garnache
document_data.mainbody: A '''garnache''' was a type of outer-garment found in the Realms.
document_data.Description: The garnache was best described as being a sort of long [[cloak]] with wide [[cape]]-like, elbow-length sleeves. It covered the wearer from their neck down to their ankles. The sleeve design of a garnache allowed bulky items (like pouches or weapons) to be hidden beneath them without attracting attention to the wearer.
document_data.Notable Users:
* Many [[fighter]]s and [[thieves]] favored the garnache due to the ease with which they could hide things in it without hindering their movement.
* In the nation of [[Tethyr]], the garnache was common garment among [[wizard]]s.<ref>
